questions.text: Who plays the grandfather who tells his grandson the story?
questions.explanation:
Peter Falk & Falk.

	'Yes, you're very smart. Now shut up.'

questions.text: What did Buttercup call Westley?
questions.explanation:
Farm boy.

	She would always begin her requests with "Farm boy..."

questions.text: What three words would Westley always say in response to her commands?
questions.explanation:
As you wish.

	'Farm boy, fetch me that pitcher.' 'As you wish.'

questions.text: Inigo is searching for the ___-fingered man who killed his father.
questions.explanation:
6 & six.

	Inigo trained to become a master swordsman so that he could avenge his father's death.

questions.text: What is the last word spoken in the rhyming scene on the boat?
questions.explanation:
Peanut.

	'No more rhymes now, I mean it!' 'Anybody want a peanut?'

questions.text: What word does Vizzini say repeatedly?
questions.explanation:
Inconceivable!.

	'You keep using that word. I do not think it means what you think it means.'

questions.text: Who is the Dread Pirate Roberts?
questions.explanation:
Westley.

	After each Dread Pirate Roberts retires, another one takes his place. Westley wasn't the first Dread Pirate Roberts.

questions.text: Which rhyme was NOT used in the 'poem' between Fezzik and Inigo on the boat?
questions.explanation:
Big.

	This poem aggravates Vizzini to no end.

questions.text: Complete this line by Inigo: 'You seem a decent fellow. I hate to _________.'
questions.explanation:
kill you.

	Inigo: 'You seem a decent fellow. I hate to kill you.' Westley: 'You seem a decent fellow. I hate to die.'

questions.text: Who heals Westley's wounds in the Pit of Dispair?
questions.explanation:
The albino.

	Count Rugen wants his prisoners healthy.

questions.text: What animals attack Westley and Buttercup in the Fire Swamp?
questions.explanation:
Rodents of Unusual Size.

	'Rodents of Unusual Size? I don't think they exist.'

questions.text: What is the sand called that Buttercup falls into?
questions.explanation:
Lightning Sand.

	'You know what THAT looks like, so we shouldn't have any trouble avoiding that now.'

questions.text: What does Miracle Max coat the life-giving pill in?
questions.explanation:
Chocolate.

	'You rush a miracle man, you get rotten miracles.'

questions.text: Who does Miracle Max hand this pill to?
questions.explanation:
Inigo & Inigo Montoya.

	Inigo then gave the pill to Westley.

questions.text: 'Do you think it'll work?' '________'
questions.explanation:
It'll take a miracle.

	Spoken by the miracle man and his wife.

questions.text: What is Count Rugen's first name?
questions.explanation:
Tyrone.

	It is mentioned in a conversation between Rugen and Humperdinck.

questions.text: Who wrote the screenplay for the movie 'The Princess Bride'?
questions.explanation:
William Goldman & Goldman.

	He also wrote the book that it is based on.

questions.text: Who played the Impressive Clergyman?
questions.explanation:
Peter Cook.

	'Mawage...'  This priest's strange accent makes him all but unintelligible.

questions.text: What does the Ancient Booer NOT call Buttercup?
questions.explanation:
Queen of trash.

	'Boo! Boo!'  In Buttercup's dream, the Ancient Booer berates her for abandoning Wesley.

questions.text: What did Fezzik handily take from Miracle Max that allowed him, Westley, and Inigo to carry out their plan?
questions.explanation:
A holocaust cloak.

	The holocaust cloak was fireproof.
